newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-News sells off Fairfax stake -papers.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-News sells off Fairfax stake -papers.

text.p: News Corp Ltd appears to have sold most of its five percent stake in John Fairfax Holdings Ltd over the last six weeks, newspapers reported on Friday.

"Indications last night were that News Corp had sold virtually all of its five percent stake in the newspaper group, with Bankers Trust Australia said to have picked up a large part of the stock," the Australian Financial Review said.
"News is believed to have been selling regularly over the past few weeks, in a series of small transactions conducted by stockbroking firm J.B. Were," The Australian said.

"A Herald search of the Fairfax share register showed that six nominee companies -- including some associated with stockbroker J.B. Were, thought to house the bulk of News' shareholding -- have offloaded their shares since the end of September," The Sydney Morning Herald said.
Last month, Murdoch said in a newspaper interview that he did not want to buy Fairfax.
